title: Satellite Imagery - EO Unified Satellite Imagery
description: This schema defines a unified entity within the SatelliteImagery domain, consolidating attributes from all existing entities related to satellite imagery, designed to offer a holistic view in the EO proccess

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It must be equal to EOSatelliteImagery

analysisType.description: Property. Entity's type of analysis applied

provider.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The provider of the algorithm

layer_name.description: Property. A string that states the layer name (e.g. band1)

layer_categorization.description: Property. A string that describes the type of information (e.g. categorical, numerical)

values_explanation.description: Property. An array with the explanation of the depicted values (e.g. [1:oil, 0:no oil])

items.description: Property. Every element in the array with the explanation of the depicted values (e.g. [1:oil, 0:no oil])

contentInformation.description: Property. An array that describes for each layer (e.g. band1) or entity name, the type of information (e.g. categorical, numerical) and an array with the explanation of the depicted values (e.g. [1:oil, 0:no oil])

localServerPath.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A mandatory text string used to declare the path that the output data layer is saved on the server

productFormat.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A mandatory text string used to declare the format of the product

productID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A mandatory text string used to declare the unique ID of the product

productType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A mandatory text string used to declare the type of the product

productURL.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/url'. A mandatory url used to declare the download link of the product

operationalMode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A text string used to declare the supported sensor modes if available

orbitNumber.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The orbit number of tha satellite pass. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code

resultDescription.description: Property. The description of the analysis outcome

analytics.description: Property. An array that describes analytics

name.description: Property. A string that states the analytics name

value.description: Property. A string that describes the analytics value

sensingDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Time'. The time at which the image was taken by the sensor

platformName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A mandatory text string used to declare the name of the platform
